title: What are the best technologies to learn so to create a good website? - Quora

response.answer_text: By good website do you mean the visual look or the functionality of the site? If you mean the visual look, you could learn bootstrap or material design. And follow the design trends that are hot to make sure that the website look visually appealing. when it comes to web development, i would recommend start with html and css, it gives you the confident to get started and its easy to get started, ones you get the basic you can switch between technologies or languages based on the requirements. Now if you mean the functionality, again the suggestions would be based on the requirements. if you want to make just a single page static website all you need is html and css, but if you need something complicated like an ecommerce or a social site, you will have to learn the other underlying languages like : js , or frameworks like meteor js, react js or angular js. The technologies i would suggest to get started are: Html Css Js Reactjs Meteorjs you could find good meteor js tutorials in youtube: Levelup tuts Getting started with React — Meteor

Good websites are not only good by looks but also the functionalities  they perform . You can make a website look good by using Bootstrap framework and css,but if you want to have more functionalities as compared to a normal website on the Internet, then you have to have knowledge about Php, j2ee, java script, jquery, DOM.  If you want to make you site beautiful then Learn bootstrap from www.learningbootstrap.com.  It has all the content that you need to make beautiful and responsive websites..
